@ reactivica - the directory should be somewhere like - C:\Program Files\Ubisoft\Heroes of Might and Magic V Collector Edition\bin

I don't know what version this is but IT IS NOT THE COLLECTOR'S EDITION. These files contain Heroes 5 version 1.0 from 2006. Crack timestamp is from 2006. Tribes of the east expansion came out 2007.  Maps added in patches are missing. Total filesize is too small to contain all the expansions. AVOID.
